title: SP-font [PeGGO]
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417062030im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SP-font_SHOW_6425.png)

A regular and very simple font done for write technical things, over machines, mechas or so.  
I believe this work so clear in any case for short phrases or for long paragraphs.. if you have some coment or critique please let me know. I'm so thanksful for C&C.

For view details please check [this PDF FILE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417062030/http:/typophile.com/files/SP-font_SHOW_TRC.pdf)

I like it, but there are two small things that stand out for me. I think perhaps D and O are a bit too similar. Is there anything you could do to differentiate them more - perhaps a bottom serif for the D? Also I'm not sure how well the long f fits in with the lower case. But of course these are both entirely subjective - perhaps they won't be problems for other people. I'll look forward to seeing any future versions.
